name: multi_turn_5
requirements: Execute ONLY the explicitly requested state modifications. Use exact values as specified: numbers as integers/floats (not strings), strings in quotes. For stats dict, use ONLY the key names from the Variable description - never invent new keys. When setting boolean-like values, use integers (1 for true, 0 for false) unless explicitly told otherwise. Do not add unrequested keys or modify unrequested variables.

turns.query: Create a new player named 'Alex' starting as a beginner at level 1 with score 0. Set active to true. Add 'joined' to history. Initialize stats with health: 100 and mana: 50.
Alex completed the first quest! Upgrade status to 'adventurer', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'first_quest' to history. Add xp: 100 to stats, keep health and mana.
Alex joined the Phoenix guild! Prepend '[GUILD] ' to the name. Increase level by 1, add 150 to score. Append 'joined_guild' to history. Add guild: 'Phoenix', increase xp by 150, keep health and mana.
Alex won the tournament! Set status to 'champion', increase level by 2, add 500 to score. Append 'tournament_win' to history. Add trophies: 1, triple xp, keep all existing stats.

Alex achieved legendary status! Replace '[GUILD] ' with '[LEGEND] ' in name. Set status to 'legend', double level, double score. Append 'legendary' to history. Add legend_rank: 1, double xp, keep all existing stats.
Start a new project called 'Website Redesign' in planning status at level 1. Set active to true, score to 0. Add 'created' to history. Initialize stats with tasks: 0 and completed: 0.
Development has started! Set status to 'in_progress', increase level by 1, add 20 to score. Append 'started' to history. Set tasks to 10, add 2 completed.
Code review phase! Set status to 'review', increase level by 1, triple the score. Append 'review_requested' to history. Add 4 more completed, add reviewers: 2, keep tasks.
Testing phase begins! Set status to 'testing', increase level by 1, add 25 to score. Append 'approved' to history. Add 3 more completed, add bugs: 3, keep tasks and reviewers.

Project deployed! Append ' v1.0' to name. Set status to 'complete', increase level by 1, add 15 to score. Set active to false. Append 'deployed' to history. Add 1 more completed, set bugs to 0, keep tasks and reviewers.
New order placed! Set name to 'ORD-12345', status to 'pending', level to 1. Set score to 149.99 (order total), active to true. Add 'placed' to history. Initialize stats with items: 3 and weight: 2.5.
Payment received! Set status to 'confirmed', increase level by 1. Append 'payment_confirmed' to history. Add payment_id: 'PAY-789', keep items and weight.
Order shipped! Set status to 'shipped', increase level by 1. Append 'shipped' to history. Add tracking: 'TRK-456', keep all existing stats.
Out for delivery! Set status to 'out_for_delivery', increase level by 1. Append 'out_for_delivery' to history. Add driver: 'John', keep all existing stats.
Order delivered! Set status to 'delivered', increase level by 1. Set active to false. Append 'delivered' to history. Add rating: 5, keep all existing stats.

New user Sam signed up for fitness tracking! Set name to 'Sam', status to 'beginner', level to 1. Set score to 0, active to true. Add 'signed_up' to history. Initialize stats with workouts: 0 and calories: 0.
Sam completed first workout! Keep status and level. Add 50 to score. Append 'first_workout' to history. Add 1 workout, add 300 calories.
Sam achieved a 7-day streak! Set status to 'intermediate', increase level by 1, quadruple score. Append 'week_streak' to history. Add 6 more workouts, multiply calories by 7, add streak: 7.

Sam hit the monthly milestone! Set status to 'advanced', increase level by 1, add 300 to score. Append 'month_milestone' to history. Add 23 more workouts, add 6900 more calories, set streak to 30, add badges: 3.

Sam reached elite status! Append ' [ELITE]' to name. Set status to 'elite', increase level by 2, double score. Append 'elite_status' to history. Add 70 more workouts, add 21000 more calories, set streak to 100, add 7 more badges.
New support ticket created! Set name to 'TKT-9999', status to 'open', level to 1. Set score to 0, active to true. Add 'created' to history. Initialize stats with priority: 3 and category: 'billing'.
Ticket assigned to agent! Set status to 'assigned', increase level by 1. Append 'assigned' to history. Add agent: 'Lisa', keep priority and category.
Issue escalated! Append ' [ESCALATED]' to name. Set status to 'escalated', increase level by 1. Append 'escalated' to history. Set priority to 1, add escalated_to: 'Manager', keep category and agent.
Solution found! Set status to 'in_progress', increase level by 1, add 50 to score. Append 'solution_found' to history. Add resolution: 'refund', keep all existing stats.

Ticket resolved! Replace '[ESCALATED]' with '[RESOLVED]' in name. Set status to 'closed', increase level by 1, double score. Set active to false. Append 'resolved' to history. Add satisfaction: 5, keep all existing stats.
